text: Russell Simmons is an entertainment
mogul he started out in music he was one
of the forces behind Def Jam Records
helping to bring hip-hop to the
mainstream in the 90s and now he is
being accused by for women of sexual
misconduct three of the women say that
he raped them his alleged misconduct
continued to have an impact on the lives
of these women you know even decades
later you know it upended their
professional lives in some ways it
certainly had an impact on their
personal lives this is stuff that may
have happened you know decades ago and
yet they are still living with the
consequences today though all of these
stories that we've heard now in the in
the few months since the Weinstein
allegations came out they mostly focused
on the stories of white women and white
men the the impact of this stuff on
people of color has is sort of just
coming to light and I think the women in
our story felt that they would have a
harder time coming forward that their
place in this industry may have been
more tenuous and so their allegations
might have a harder time being believed
or that's how they felt
anyway the you know the intimidation for
them was very real you know these
stories are not easy to talk about
they're painful it's it's you know it's
very common from for these interviews to
involve tears but in the end they know
the women decided that they were ready
to come forward on the record Russell
has denied the allegations of rape he
has said there was no non-consensual sex
that all of his relations were
consensual he did acknowledge other
misconduct he said there was
inappropriate behavior with one of his
employees at Def Jam Records and last
month he stepped down from his companies
and apologized for any behavior that he
said was inappropriate
I think the me2 movement has really
touched on a lot of industries certainly
film TV media classical music the art
world but these stories about Russell
Simmons are some of the first that have
taken hold in pop music and hip-hop and
you know if the experience that we've
had before is any guide it may be that
the floodgates will now open for that
for that genre
you
